plot: A lone astronaut on an endurance mission is forced to cope with an intrusive force which threatens to derail the operation.
title: Waltz for One
plot_es: A lone astronaut on an endurance mission is forced to cope with an intrusive force which threatens to derail the operation.
plot_en: A lone astronaut on an endurance mission is forced to cope with an intrusive force which threatens to derail the operation.
